summary: As part of the U.S. response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, DOD has trained Ukrainian personnel on specific group operations, weapons, and leadership within a broader international effort. DOD prioritized a quick start to the training without fully identifying and planning for training needs. For example, sometimes the training didn't reflect the trainers' expertise, or needed equipment hadn't arrived in time. As a result, the...
title: Ukraine: DOD Can Take Additional Steps to Improve Its Security Assistance Training
